episode_event_general_valentine_2021/670:
Would you like to do something fun for Palentine’s
Day with us?

Palentine’s Day is a day for showing thanks to all
the people close to you by giving them sweets.

We’re going to make our Palentine’s Day sweets
from scratch!

We even changed outfits into something more
suited to the task!

We can get the ingredients we need for our
sweets in town.

We’re going to go ahead and make our way to
town. We’ll see you there later!
episode_event_general_valentine_2021/680: I can’t wait to get baking!

Hey, Dawn, have you decided who you’re going to
give sweets to for Palentine’s Day?

Of course I have! I’m going to give some to you
and Alcremie and Whimsicott and...

Hehe! Thanks, Dawn. I’ll be sure to give you
some, too!
Thank you! I can’t wait to try whatever you make!
